title: Spacious 2 Bedroom at Ashland Pines. Available Now!
posting_body: ['RENT:', '$1627/Month |', 'SIZE:', '1134 sq ft |', 'BEDROOMS:', '2 |', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', "Half off first month's rent!", 'ABOUT COMMUNITY:', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments offer exceptional features.', 'Residents enjoy wood burning stone fireplaces, full size washers and dryer connections, and spacious floor plans with bay windows that allow abundant natural light.', 'Pet Policy: A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '◾ Balcony/Patio', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpeting', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Kitchen', '◾ Storage Units', '◾ Stove', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Views', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ Linen Closet', '◾ Refrigerator/Freezer', '◾ Trash Compactor', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Wood Burning Fireplace', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '◾ BBQ/Picnic Area', '◾ Conference Room', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Grill', '◾ Maintenance/Manager on site', '◾ Multi Use Room', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Security System', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Car Wash Area', '◾ Dog Park Pet Care', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Planned Community Activities', '◾ Sports Courts', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', '◾ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '◾ Wireless Internet Available', 'CONTACT US TODAY!', 'Ashland Pines', '1247 Adcox Road', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30088', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C4E79A769DD945C']
